skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
The Knights Mariner lucky enough to serve under Captain Walblatt are considered the fiercest of the Cult.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 when fighting at sea
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +10 when fighting at sea
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: He who has not set foot on land for nine years speaks the language of the oceans.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a swarm of Augus fish

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Fisherman's Eye"
	(factionwide)
Melee Defence: +15 for summoned Fish units

skillTree.localised_description: Only Dubnitz matches Walblatt when it comes to reputation within the Knightly order.
The sea creatures carrying Manann's blessing traverse the seabed unscathed.
It is said Captain Walblatt can navigate even the shallowest of waters with his eyes closed.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: ''We did it, men! The Whale is down! Long live Manann! Long live the Cult!''

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
"You're a big git, but you're in bad shape. For me, it's a full-time job – now behave yourself."
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

items.colour_text: Captain Walblatt is a well-known member of the Knights Mariner, and tales of his exploits are told throughout the coastal regions of the Old World. It is not prowess in battle or devotion that these legends tell of, but of the quest Walblatt has tirelessly devoted himself to for nigh on a decade. For the past nine years, since the last, ill-fated voyage of the templar warship, Manann’s Trident, of which Walblatt is the only survivor, he has hunted the great red Chaos whale that wrecked his ship, swallowed his Trident and killed his crewmates. Unscathed and spotless, the Trident emerges from the bested Whale's stomach. Surely this is a gift by Manann himself.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Captain Aber Walblatt is the mighty Knight Mariner who hunted the Red Chaos Whale for over nine years, not setting foot on land a single time.

effects.description: Attribute: Charge Reflection for Cult of Manann units

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
